patthana23.17:4.1: Nakusalo napaccuppanno dhammo kusalassa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.17:5.1: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, natthiyā vigate soḷasa.
patthana23.17:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.17:7.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.17:7.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.17:8.1: Nakusalaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
